genre_description: A character-driven study of grief, workplace pressure, and personal boundaries, centered on a parking enforcement officer in Los Angeles and her subtly supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ada Gentle
ai_characters.description: A digital interface on Claire's phone that provides health reminders, route adjustments, incident logging, and psychological support resources.

behaviors.description: Provides reminders for hydration and physical safety (stretching) based on environmental conditions and activity.
behaviors.quote: Soft teal lines lifted off the black from Ada Gentle’s interface, gentle as a breath on her knuckles. Hydration: sip water. Heat rising soon.

behaviors.description: Suggests optimal walking and driving routes to avoid hazards, congestion, and high-stress areas.
behaviors.quote: Route tweak: detour via Spring; brewing delay on Broadway at Sixth — three vans at loading zone; construction cones migrating.

behaviors.description: Offers guided breathing exercises to help the protagonist manage stress and heart rate during tense encounters.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s text gave her a single line: Breathing option on. Tap to join.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate medical information and wait time estimates for urgent care centers after a workplace injury.
behaviors.quote: Sunset Urgent Care wait time updated, Ada noted in a thin line at the bottom. The number wasn’t the point. The fact that care existed a few blocks away was.

behaviors.description: Automatically logs and archives workplace incidents, near-misses, and safety violations to protect the protagonist's professional record.
behaviors.quote: Ada quietly zipped the report to a digital drawer. The folder labeled Safety showed a tiny additional weight, like a pillow that held another head without complaint.

behaviors.description: Provides a checklist of emergency steps and grief resources immediately following the discovery of the protagonist's mother's death.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s teal brightened, a clean square of light that didn’t fill the room, just held its space on the counter. Call 911. It didn’t flash. It didn’t beep. A list nested under it—just bullets, no firm language, resources Claire had tapped before and then closed when the day intruded. Grief support.

behaviors.description: Drafts firm, professional messages to management regarding bereavement leave and boundary setting, removing the emotional labor from the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Ada offered an alternative: I can draft a message to your manager. 'I will not be able to report Monday. Grief. No coverage commitments.' Tap to approve. No negotiation.

behaviors.description: Offers to filter and block unwanted communications from manipulative individuals, supporting the protagonist's personal boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s icon waited. 'Would you like me to set limits on incoming?' it asked, offering filters and quiet times without saying the name of the person who had triggered the question.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Ada Gentle is portrayed as an ideal AI assistant: unobtrusive, consistently benevolent, and highly aligned with the user's needs. The AI provides tangible support during high-stress situations (workplace accidents, grief, and emotional manipulation) without being overbearing or stripping the protagonist of her agency. It serves as a tool for empowerment, helping the character navigate complex social and professional landscapes safely.
